import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; /** * artist * album * genre * release_date * label * price * tracklist * cover_image */ const InventoryList = ({filteredRecs}) => { return (
{records.map(rec => (
Artist:

{rec.artist}

 Genre:

{rec.genre}

 Release Date:

{rec.release_date}

 Label:

{rec.label}

 Price:

$ {rec.price}

Tracklist:

{rec.tracklist}
)) }
); }; export default InventoryList;
